website_summaries.verdict: Extremely popular model of youth leg guards that have a perfect mix of comfort and protection.
pros: Offers some detachable pieces, so you can achieve the most comfortable fit
Uses stainless steel buckles to provide longevity
Includes triple protection on the knee cap, yet this area is surprisingly flexible
Available in a dozen color combinations
cons: Protection for the top of the foot isn't as good as some other designs

customer_reviews.title: Simply awsome
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 9 year old son to use for Little League. The League issued guards were too small and too cheaply made to be of much use. While these are a tad too big for my tall 9 year old, they offer maximum protection, comfort and they look amazing. Almost pulled the trigger on a more expensive brand, but glad I didn't. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: RMillie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shin Guards.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is is nine and is 4'7" tall and we were looking for a pair of shin guards that would fit her. These fit perfectly!! They have a lot of straps that after adjusting keep the shins guards in place. They have taken a beating and are still going strong. They also allow her to move freely or as freely as you can in shin guards!
customer_reviews.author: Laynie

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: Our rec league gives out crappy "house" knee pads, so I decided to upgrade for my team. Bought these shin guards, they are seriously awesome. Gives the kids a little extra protection on their feet as well as their knees, and they are easily and quickly adjustable to account for different sized kids playing catcher. Couldn't recommend them more.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Hille

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these. She has been a catcher for ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. She has been a catcher for 5 years and I buy a new set every season and she has no trouble at all with quality. Typical ball player is superstitious and will only wear Mizuno and as a high school player she wears these daily for either practice or games
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth $$$!!
customer_reviews.text: 9 yo Daughter used these straight out of the box for 2 hour practice and next day for 4 of 5 games for fast pitch softball select/travel tournament. She said loves the knee padding, grip tech - DryLite Screen (Texas Heat), extra knee plate and straps! The Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for 9u and 10u.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and I really recommend them. My kid is an average 9 yr old and they fit perfectly with room to grow. I recommend that they are used with knee wedges for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of Mizuno shin guards I have purchased. My 12 year old has been wearing the intermediate set for 2 years and now my 8 year old is wearing the youth size and loves them. They are extremely flexible in all the right places and both girls love the padding right at the knee cap, very comfortable when blocking balls.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerdad22

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 12 year old and he has zero complaints! Says it’s a great fit and feels comfortable during his games.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Best of The Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old for travel baseball. The fit is excellent, the padding is supreme, and the floating kneecap pad is the best. The material is extremely strong and my son says he doesn't even notice when wearing them. I would recommend this to any youth baseball player. Some of his teammates have some of the other manufacturers and they don't even measure up to Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy Cool

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno by far is the best looking equipment around and an excellent quality. My son loved these but they ran much bigger than other brands. I had to return but will buy these for him when he gets a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Honeysuckle3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and looks sharp! Bought these for my husky 11 yr old catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Just Ellen Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shin guards and they are nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice shin guards!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5'-3" and these fit him well. He likes them too, says they are comfortable. Pretty nice shin guards!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Donnelly II

customer_reviews.title: easy to get on/off
customer_reviews.text: 10-yr old son enjoys this set of guards. triple knee coverage and inside knee pad are helpful. easy to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra knee protection. Great to have our own gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Emerman

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These have been my 10 y/o’s favorite pair of shin guards! Comfortable and easy to maneuver in, would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: travis k.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice guards. 12 yr old daughter loves her set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Really Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: I took the leap and ordered despite the fact that there is a chest plate pictured rather than the leg guards. My daughter loves these. She says they are the most comfortable ever!
customer_reviews.author: nikkifaith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gear
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Fit my 9 yr old with room to grow. The quality and protection is better than any I have bought my 3 boys.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: not only does it look really professional. My son is the primary catcher on the team and I feel like we got a good quality product that will also keep him safe.
customer_reviews.author: Walt X

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my son after he kept getting hit in the indide of his kenn with foul balls. The wrap around protection works great and still provides very good mobility. The only thing he doesn't like are the straps that go right behind the knee which hold on the flap over the knee joint. The straps rub and the flap flaps when running. The flap is removable which solves both problems, but exposes that area of the knee. Overall I would recommend these. They provide great protection, are durable, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Markham

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves these. Fits well, Mizuno all the ...
customer_reviews.text: daughter loves these. Fits well , Mizuno all the way!
customer_reviews.author: softball mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not sell Mizuno youth catchers gear in orange and black box sets. Wish they did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love Mizuno!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year son loves how comfortable they are and added padding in the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They are great everything was awesome. My son loves them and they match his uniform. My son said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shin gurards
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very light. The three kneecap design provides extra protection without feeling too bulky. Love Mizuno softball equipment and will definitely buy again when we need a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yo daughter is going into her 3rd season of travel ball wearing these shin guards. They have held up well and she catches 80-90% of her team's games. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TrooperWife

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and protection. My son (9yrs) needed help adjusting the straps, but able to put them on immediately and felt comfortable catching balls from older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Marvis M. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of durability
customer_reviews.text: These shin guards are really great...until about a year of use and then the straps that connect the overlapping knee guards start to fray and eventually break, which is going to cause me to buy a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilinski

customer_reviews.title: Our 9-10U youth baseball team catchers love the new set
customer_reviews.text: Our 9-10U youth baseball team catchers love the new set. Makes them look like mechanized infantry or something! The old (different brand, cheaper) set was missing straps and otherwise falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Market Forces, Inc.

product_meta.title: Mizuno Youth G3 Samurai Shin Guards (14.5-Inch)
product_meta.description:
Mizuno G3 Youth Samurai Shin Guards with a new design feature innovative construction for durability, comfort, and very lightweight performance. Patented detachable K-Pad for a superior fit and critical knee protection. Flexible, protective double knee cap. Stainless metal buckles for durability. Grippy DryLite printing reduces slipping. Additional protection on inner shin. Size: 14.5''.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :14 x 14 x 7 inches; 2 Pounds
 * Item model number :380200.6090.01.0000
 * Date First Available :July 17, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Mizuno
 * ASIN :B008M0UKQY

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #466,915 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #65270 inTeam Sports 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars54 ratings Mizuno G3 Youth Samurai Shin Guards with a new design feature innovative construction for durability, comfort, and very lightweight performance. Patented detachable K-Pad for a superior fit and critical knee protection. Flexible, protective double knee cap. Stainless metal buckles for durability. Grippy DryLite printing reduces slipping. Additional protection on inner shin. Size: 14.5''.
feature_bullets: Patented detachable K-Pad for superior fit and knee protection
